item.title: What is wrong with this small script?
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Here you go.[code]program autotalker;
var message1: string;
message2: string;
message3: string;
message4: string;
counter: Integer;
multimessages: string;
begin
message1:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message2:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message3:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message4:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
counter:= 0
multimessages:= ‘no’
repeat
if (multimessages= ‘no’) then
wait (500) //change this to the time you want it to wait between typing it works in milliseconds
sendkeys(message1+chr(13));
counter:=counter + 1;
until(counter = 100); //change the ten to how many times you want it to repeat
repeat
wait (500) //change this to the time you want it to wait between typing it works in milliseconds
sendkeys(message1+chr(13));
sendkeys(message2+chr(13));
sendkeys(message3+chr(13));
sendkeys(message4+chr(13));
counter:=counter + 1;
until(counter = 100); //change the ten to how many times you want it to repeat

end.[/code]
Also next time, put your scar script in the tags.

Read full topic
item.source: What is wrong with this small script?

item.title: What is wrong with this small script?
item.dc:creator: @eggy0095 eggy0095
item.description:
@eggy0095 wrote:

hi i have been recently working on an autotalker for my first real script but whenever i try to compile i get the same error “Line 21: [Error] (21:1): Identifier expected in script” here is the script help is appreciated

[scar]program autotalker;
var message1: string;
message2: string;
message3: string;
message4: string;
counter: Integer;
multimessages: string;
begin
message1:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message2:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message3:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
message4:= ‘eggy’; //change this to what you want it to say
counter:= 0
multimessages:= ‘no’
repeat
if (multimessages= ‘no’) then
wait (500) //change this to the time you want it to wait between typing it works in milliseconds
sendkeys(message1+chr(13));
counter:=counter + 1;
until(counter = 100); //change the ten to how many times you want it to repeat
else;
wait (500) //change this to the time you want it to wait between typing it works in milliseconds
sendkeys(message1+chr(13));
sendkeys(message2+chr(13));
sendkeys(message3+chr(13));
sendkeys(message4+chr(13));
counter:=counter + 1;
until(counter = 100); //change the ten to how many times you want it to repeat

end else.

end.

[/scar]

thanks for looking i hope you can help

Read full topic
